15.title: Episode #1.15

24.title: Episode #1.24

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Saewa tries to scare Anna into forcing Dong Hae to take her back to America and Dong Hae prepares for cooking test.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Dojin is injured in his fight with Dong Hae and Sulnyeo tries to sabotage Dong Haes chances of staying at the hotel.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Dojin's dad, Kim Jun, finds out that Anna may be in Korea and Dong Hae gets a second chance on his cooking test.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: While Kim Jun tries to find out if Anna really is in Korea, Hyesuk tries to find out what he's been hiding from her.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Anna and Dong Hae are forced to return to the States when a problem with their visa's is reported to the authorities.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Eveeryone losses contact with Dong Hae and Anna after the are deported and someone tries to get Bong Yi fired from the hotel.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Its been 2 months but Dong Hae and Anna return on the day of Saewa's wedding. Saeyeong goes into labor on Saewa's big day.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Dong Hae gets his job back at the Camelia hotel and Kim Jun thinks there is something going on with Saewa and Dong Hae.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Kim Jun finds out about Saewa and Dong Hae's pass but decides its best not to tell his family.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Director Kim questions Karl about his feelings for Saewa and the reason he came to Korea. Anna receives camellia as a gift but she is more worried about Karl discovering her headache.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Kim Do Jin feels like something is wrong as he offers Saewa transportation to her job. Bong Yi has an unpleasant exchange with Saewa even though she has been told to treat her with more respect.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Director Kim asks Saewa about her relationship with Karl but she denies knowing him. A family dinner proves to be embarrassing for some members as teasing continues to be an issue.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Anna sees Saewa's picture and mistakenly breaks the frame that surrounds her photo. At work, a surprised Bong Yi is left behind after a car arrives to take Karl home.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Saewa is shocked to find a photo of Anna while searching through the desk of her father-in-law. Bong Yi and Dong Hae participate in a special cooking competition at the hotel.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Director Kim arrives at the hotel but he does not see Anna as she looks for the cooking competition. Anna follows Saewa and asks if she knows where James is located.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Dong Hae overhears Sunae talking with her family and their conversation makes him think about their current status. A devious Saewa tells Anna not to reveal the continuing search for James.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Lee Gangjae's wife confronts the Kims after learning Kim Joon's connection to her own family. Saewa tells her mother that Don Jin does not know that Kim Joon is Dong Hae's father.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Director Kim's wife confronts Lee Gangjae's entire family about their treatment of her husband. Anna tells Dong Hae that Saewa found James but she must keep the discovery a secret.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Saewa continues to cover up her past life at Columbia. Anna wants to apply for a job at the hotel but Dong Hae is worried about her ability to work with housekeeping.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Do Jin becomes upset after he overhears information about Saewa's last relationship. Kim Joon talks with Saewa about a new job but she discourages him from taking the position.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Do Jin learns about Saewa's life but he fails to discover the name of a man she lived with at the time. The Lee family holds a ceremony for the anniversary of their father's death.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Do Jin thinks Saewa lived with Dong Hae as he continues to gather information on her past. Saewa's mother is interested in Pil Jae but he only shows interest towards Anna.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Do Jin is knocked unconscious when a box falls during his fight with Dong Hae. Bong Yi's chance to win the cooking competition is in jeopardy after Dong Hae's late arrival.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Director Kim wants Dong Hae to leave the hotel but Do Jin has a different idea. Anna runs from Saewa and she cannot find Dong Hae in the locker room.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Dong Hae considers leaving for another hotel but Bong Yi wants him to stay. Do Jin has an angry confrontation with Saewa's mother about her part in hiding a past relationship.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Anna tells Mrs. Kim about Saewa helping her search for James. Pil Jae expresses his strong feelings for Anna but family members have their doubts about the relationship being successful.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Saewa tells her mother that a man named James is her father-in-law. At work, Saewa is assigned an interview with Carl Laker but she develops stomach pains after becoming nervous.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Do Jin tells his mother the marriage is over while Kim Jun disagrees with the decision. Saewa makes threats to Dong Hae concerning James but he reveals the threats to Bong Yi.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Dong Hae talks to Bong Yi about leaving his job as she tries to convince him against the move. Saewa attempts to make people believe that Dong Hae is a bad person.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: After talking to Saewa's mother, Anna believes Kim Jun knows where James is located. Dong Hae hands in his resignation as he tries to avoid creating more problems for the company.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: A tabloid reporter appears at the Kim home to address recent rumors of trouble in Saewa's marriage. Mrs. Kim feels Saewa lied about the real reason reporters visited the family.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Dong Hae attempts to talk with Mr. Kim but Do Jin stops the conversation. Do Jin's mother is determined to get Saewa out of his life as he contemplates a divorce.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Saewa plans to have Dong Hae and Anna fired from the hotel. Dong Hae tries to call Mr. Kim but Saewa answers with a text that states the conversation is over.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Mr. Kim searches for Anna after seeing her in an elevator at the hotel. Saewa's mother continues to hope for Pil Jae's interest as he stays focused on Anna.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: James and Anna meet as she crosses the street but a collapse threatens their reunion. The cooking competition begins its final round and Do Jin adds a special ingredient for each recipe.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Anna tells Bong Yi that she saw James before her collapse. Dong Hae wins the cooking competition and he thanks Bong Yi for all of her help with the event.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Kim Joon comes to Lee Gangjae's house as he continues to search for Anna. An angry Dong Hae confronts Saewa about luring his mother away from the hotel during an important event.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Dong Hae finds Kim Joon near Anna's home but he does not reveal the reason for his appearance. Anna reveals what Saewa said about withholding the photo of James.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: Anna is called to Mrs. Kim's office but Saewa advises her not to go. Kim Joon finds Do Jin and Dong Hae fighting in the hotel and he cautions them to stop this behavior.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: James meets Anna and he has many questions for her as Saewa tries to sabotage the conversation. Dong Hae and Pil Jae start a search for Anna after she fails to answer her phone.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Anna goes to meet James but he wonders if Dong Hae is his son. Mrs. Kim tries to persuade her husband that a news anchor job will be his introduction into politics.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Dong Hae's mother asks him to meet someone special but James has an accident before he can arrive. Mr. Kim is rushed to the hospital with head trauma and the doctors quickly begin surgery.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Dong Hae overhears Saewa talking to his mother as she threatens to keep James with her. Mrs. Kim will not leave her husband's bedside after bad news concerning his health.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Pil Jae helps Anna search the hospital but she finds Saewa with James. Tae Hoon must care for the twins after his wife goes to a photo shoot and stays out all night.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Saewa feels that she must get rid of Dong Hae and Anna to save her marriage. Kim Jun wakes from a coma to see his wife and doctors surrounding the bed.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Dong Hae goes to the hospital and Mr. Kim asks for his forgiveness. Tae Hoon visits his family and fights with his wife before contemplating a divorce after their confrontation.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: Anna becomes upset after talking with Saewa's mother about Kim Jun and his family. Mrs. Kim puts Dong Hae on probation as he faces accusations of meeting with a hotel broker.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Kim Jun comes to the hotel but his meeting with Dong Hae is interrupted by Bong Yi. Saewa is caught in another lie and Mrs. Kim presses Do Jin to get a divorce.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: Anna is overcome as Kim Jun enters her meeting with Mrs. Kim. Sae Yeong comes home late and her mother sends the twins to another family member's house for the night.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Pil Jae learns that the man Anna has been searching for is Kim Jun. Mrs. Kim leaves without revealing her plans as Kim Jun is forced to tell her about Anna.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Hyesuk is shocked to see Dong Hae holding a harmonica that belongs to her husband. The cooking competition continues at a television station as Saewa interviews the remaining contestants about their recipes.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Saewa worries about her mother-in-law revealing information concerning Anna. The Lees are hopeful that Bong Yi will be able to find a good husband as they consider purchasing a house for Tae Hoon.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Kim Jun reveals a plan to tell Dong Hae about his father's true identity. Saewa looks for other opportunities at the station after receiving good news concerning the ratings for her program.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Yu Jin visits Dong Hae's house and announces that she is his girlfriend. Kim Jun and his wife try to work out their feelings after the truth comes out.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: Do Jin is disturbed to learn a serious decision involving his parents. Lee Gangjae prepares his new factory and he looks forward to a very profitable future for everyone involved with the venture.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: Pil Jae tells his father about Anna as he shows concern for her ability to deal with the situation. Saewa's mother offers money to have Anna and Dong Hae move from the area.

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: Do Jin searches for a family member as his mother experiences stress. The Lee family gathers for a New Year's celebration and the grandchildren are happy to receive money from Gangjae.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: Do Jin learns information concerning Dong Hae and Anna after Kim Jun dials the wrong number. Do Jin and Dong Hae meet Kin Jun at his car as they wonder about the situation.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: Anna waits for Kim Jun but the cold weather is not good for her weak heart. Saewa makes another attempt to get rid of Dong Hae and Anna before Do Jin can discover their secret.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: Saewa worries that Do Jin has discovered the truth after seeing him flee from his father's office. Tae Hoon talks to his wife about studying law and he strongly advocates staying away from all illegal activities.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Dong Hae is upset to discover that he is Kim Jun's son. Lee Gangjae starts to interview people for the kimchi factory but his wife asks too many questions of the applicants.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Tae Hoon and his wife fill out paperwork for the bank but the twins ruin the forms. Mrs. Kim tells Saewa to leave home and live with her own mother.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: Dong Hae talks to Kim Jun and his father asks for forgiveness. Tae Hoon plans to give up his studies because it seems unlikely that he will ever become a lawyer.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: Mrs. Kim wants to end the hotel involvement with the cooking completion. Lee Gangjae is urged to get rid of Dong Hae and Anna as Mrs. Kim warns that he will lose his new contract.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Do Jin attempts to learn the identity of Dong Hae father's before getting into a fight. Dong Hae arrives at the studio to film a cooking show but bruises appear on his face.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Dong Hae learns from the cooking show's producer that he cannot leave the show. Mrs. Kim tells an associate that she wants Do Jin found immediately before anything else can happen.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Saewa tells her mother-in-law that she will be responsible for getting Dong Hae and Anna out of Korea. Dong Hae invites Bong Yi to spend time with him at the park.

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: A worried Pil Jae begins to search for Anna after noticing she is gone. Bong Yi is dismayed to learn that Dong Hae will be moving out of their house.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Do Jin and his mother go to the airport as Kim Jun waits for the Chos to arrive. The Lee family has trouble dealing with all of the circumstances surrounding Dong Hae and Anna.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Pil Jae sends Anna's photo to all police stations and he finally gets a lead. Do Jin and Saewa stop by the road to fight about her appearance at the airport.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Mrs. Cho flees from the bedroom after waking from a dream about her daughter. Yujin calls Bong Yi to say that she saw Dong Hae but he quickly disappeared into the crowd.

103.title: Episode #1.103
103.plot: Saeyeong finds out she is pregnant again and leaves home to think about starting a new life. The Chos want family members to assist them in the search for a missing daughter.

104.title: Episode #1.104
104.plot: Lee Gangjae leaves his factory to talk with Mrs. Kim about a contract annulment. Dong Hae carries Mrs. Cho out of the hotel after she collapses in the main lobby.

105.title: Episode #1.105
105.plot: Do Jin does not want Dong Hae to represent the hotel on a television program but the show's producer insists he appear. Pil Jae finds Anna and they have coffee in her new apartment.

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

107.title: Episode #1.107
107.plot: Saewa tells her mother that she will lose more if the divorce continues. Anna and Dong Hae come back to the Lee home and Lee Gangjae offers them a job in his factory.

108.title: Episode #1.108
108.plot: Anna talks with Mr. Cho and he upsets her by saying that Kim Jun already has a family. Dong Hae and Tae Hoon begin their jobs at the kimchi factory.

109.title: Episode #1.109
109.plot: Dong Hae confronts Mr. Cho about his discussion with Anna as an angry Do Jin starts a fight. A curious Kim Jun begins his own search for the Chos' missing daughter.

110.title: Episode #1.110
110.plot: Saewa sees a photo of the Chos' missing daughter and realizes that Anna is Dongbaek. Tae Hoon brings his parents money to save the business but the funds belong to Seonyeong.

111.title: Episode #1.111
111.plot: Mrs. Kim has Saewa escorted from the hotel. Dong Hae approaches a television producer about his idea to sell Taebong Kimchi on a home shopping network and the pitch is accepted.

112.title: Episode #1.112
112.plot: Anna receives a call from Mr. Cho as he tries to ask her an important question. Bong Yi sees Dong Hae and Saewa talking but she worries that another plan may be unfolding.

113.title: Episode #1.113
113.plot: Dong Hae remembers a story about Anna's parents dying in a storm but he wonders if it was a lie. Do Jin tries to replicate Taebong Kimchi but no one is able to find the missing ingredient.

114.title: Episode #1.114
114.plot: The hotel tries to keep Taebong Kimchi off the shopping network but their mission fails. Mrs. Cho is resting in the hospital after receiving upsetting news about Dongbaek's heart condition.

115.title: Episode #1.115
115.plot: Saewa tells Hyesuk that she wants to be Do Jin's wife. Anna visits Mrs. Cho in the hospital after hearing that she was ill but Mr. Cho worries the situation could become worse.

116.title: Episode #1.116
116.plot: Anna struggles to keep a childhood keepsake after Saewa attempts to take if from her. Pil Jae arrives home to find a strange man standing outside but he runs away before revealing his identity.

117.title: Episode #1.117
117.plot: Anna tells Mrs. Cho that she is scared of Saewa as they arrive at the Lees' home. Saewa receives a call to take over for the anchor who had an accident.

118.title: Episode #1.118
118.plot: Mrs. Kim realizes that Anna is the Chos' missing daughter after seeing a red dress. Bong Yi wonders if she should represent the hotel in a competition as Dong Hae reassures her.

119.title: Episode #1.119
119.plot: Pil Jae confronts Saewa's mother about stealing the dress from Anna but she denies the accusation. Dong Hae and Tae Hoon learn the script for their show as someone else assists them during the actual presentation.

120.title: Episode #1.120
120.plot: Hyesuk and Saewa want to stop the newspaper from running a missing person ad for Cho Dongbeak. Pil Jae is injured as he saves Anna from being hit by a car.

121.title: Episode #1.121
121.plot: Bong Yi receives a marriage proposal but she claims to be in love with Dong Hae. Saewa lies to Kim Jun when he finds several items for the DNA test.

122.title: Episode #1.122
122.plot: Saewa sabotages Taebong Kimchi's sales while promoting Camelia Hotel's kimchi.. Kim Jun is suspicious of Saewa's motives and he calls all DNA centers in Seoul to look for testing results.

123.title: Episode #1.123
123.plot: Kim Jun learns that his wife will do anything to keep the family's assets. Tae Hoon confronts Saewa about the sabotage of Taebong Kimchi sales but she denies any involvement in the plan.

124.title: Episode #1.124
124.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

125.title: Episode #1.125
125.plot: Dong Hae asks Kim Jun if he knows Anna's real parents. Saewa's mother tells her not to continue with her currents plans as the situation becomes more serious.

126.title: Episode #1.126
126.plot: Mrs. Cho finds a dress that belongs to Anna and demands to know why it is located in Hyesuk's closet. Anna receives a call from the adoption center notifying her of a parent's search.

127.title: Episode #1.127
127.plot: Kim Seonu is confident that Bong Yi will eventually marry him. Pil Jae takes a nervous Anna to the child adoption center but Saewa is upset by their good news.

128.title: Episode #1.128
128.plot: Anna, Dong Hae and the Chos are reunited at the adoption center and everyone is happy except Hyesuk. Saewa is angry about her current situation after everything she has done for Do Jin.

129.title: Episode #1.129
129.plot: The Chos thank Lee Gangjae and his family for all they have done to help Anna. Bong Yi goes on a date with Seonu as her mother attempts to call.

130.title: Episode #1.130

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Kim Jun is confronted at a board meeting about Saewa's actions and he accepts blame for the events. Dong Hae is asked to take over kimchi sales for the hotel.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: Mr. Cho offers Dong Hae his family name but he refuses to make a choice. A chef offers to spy on Dong Hae and give regular reports to Do Jin.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Piljae urges Kim Jun to take control of the situation as Anna watches. Hyesuk and Do Jin attempt to purchase shares in the hotel as they plan to control the business.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot:

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot:
Know what this is about?

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Lee Gangjae reads a news story about Cho Pilyong as the rest of his family tries to find information about the charges. Hyesuk denies knowing anything about the charges against Mr. Cho.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: Mr. Cho tells his wife that everything will be fine as he loses a majority stake in the hotel. Saewa discovers that she is pregnant with Do Jin's child.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Mrs. Cho tells Hyesuk that her husband is taking full responsibility for the tax problems. The chefs discuss the hotel's uncertain future if there are significant changes to its operations.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Dong Hae attempts to talk with Seonu but he refuses. Mr. Cho asks that Do Jin and Dong Hae share the same office and this request angers one of the men.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: The Chos' offer to pay for Dong Hae and Bong Yi's wedding. Dong Hae accuses Seonu of being involved in tax problems but he will not answer the serious questions.

145.title: Episode #1.145
145.plot: Dong Hae says Bong Yi looks beautiful after seeing her in a wedding dress. Hyesuk brings information to Mr. Cho concerning the emergency shareholders meeting and its impact on current operations.

146.title: Episode #1.146
146.plot: Saewa tells Hyesuk and Do Jin about buying hotel stock that was on the market because of Mr Cho's sale. Mr. Cho learns the truth about Hyesuk and Do Jin.

147.title: Episode #1.147
147.plot: Kim Jun confronts his wife and son about their part in the hotel's problems. Dong Hae talks to Do Jin as suspicions grow concerning the hotel's tax problems and a plan to takeover the business.

148.title: Episode #1.148
148.plot: Dong Hae sets out to find Seonu and finally prove that his grandfather was set up. Everyone feels that Mr. Cho will recover after he is hospitalized for an unknown illness.

149.title: Episode #1.149
149.plot: Do Jin accuses Saewa of using her pregnancy to ruin his life. Hyesuk has an emotional breakdown while driving but Kim Jun stops to help her through the difficult situation.

150.title: Episode #1.150
150.plot: Yujin meets Bong Yi and takes the opportunity to cause more trouble. A defiant Do Jin tells his mother that he will not be punished for lingering problems at the hotel.

151.title: Episode #1.151
151.plot: A frightened Saewa is taken to the hospital as she worries about problems with the baby. Bong Yi has an argument with Do Jin after she leaves Saewa at the hospital.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: Angry investors attempt to get their money back after Mr. Cho falls into a coma. Pil Jae questions Seonu as construction at the hotel stops before a project is completed.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: Do Jin talks to Saewa about a mysterious key but she refuses to answer his questions. Bong Yi asks Yujin to support Dong Hae at the stockholders meeting as they attempt to hide the plan.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: Construction resumes at the hotel as Do Jin says he will disobey his mother. Dong Hae finds gold that Mr. Cho saved in a bank and a special note offers instructions about its use.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Dong Hae receives word that Mr. Cho has come out of his coma. Mrs. Kim gives Dong Hae her voting rights and the action causes Do Jin to walk out of the shareholders meeting.

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: Mrs. Cho tells Hyesuk that she has committed a crime. Kim Jun receives news from his doctor about a treatment but he is reluctant to set a date for the procedure.

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot:

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: Anna and Kim Jun decide to end the relationship but they vow to have good memories of their time together. Families come together for the wedding of Bong Yi and Dong Hae.

imdb.plot outline: Raised in America by his mentally handicapped mother Anna, Dong Hae dreams of traveling to Korea to propose to the woman he loves. After qualifying for a speed skating competition, he smuggles his mother to Korea with him, but his undying devotion to her soon begins causing him problems. Finally reconnecting with his lost love Saewa, Dong Hae finds his affections divided when things don't work out as he planned in this award-winning daily drama.
imdb.title: Useora Donghaeya
plot: Raised in America by his mentally handicapped mother Anna, Dong Hae dreams of traveling to Korea to propose to the woman he loves. After qualifying for a speed skating competition, he smuggles his mother to Korea with him, but his undying devotion to her soon begins causing him problems. Finally reconnecting with his lost love Saewa, Dong Hae finds his affections divided when things don't work out as he planned in this award-winning daily drama.
